name: CyberJumper
description:
CyberJumper is a 3D  first-person platformer. It was made for the purpose of the TUM Eige Tutorium 2021/2022. It is seperated into three Levels with each adding a new mechanic to the game.

First Level: Wallrunning and Sliding

Second Level: Graplinggun

Third Level: Portalgun

The game is made for speedrunning even though the mechanics need some time to understand and master.

The aim of the game is to collect 3 coins in each level and to complete all 3 levels. 

We sadly had no time for an ingame tutorial, so here it is:

Press W,A,S,D to move

Press W and Shift to slide

 Jump and run while standing next to a wallrunnable wall (black walls in the first level, specific containers in the second level and the walls from the first level in the third level)

Press rightclick to shoot the graplinggun onto a yellow surface. press rightclick again at the right time to release the rope to get momentum and jump over  obstacles

Press leftclick onto a blue surface to shoot the portalgun. Walk through to get to the other side. (It's not like in portal, you always shoot just one portal which leads to the same position in the opposite dimension. 

This Game was made by:

Joshua Jackson, Elias Kaspar, Florian Wenske
